channel.title: A skill idea
channel.description:
ok this is my thread were im asking you for ideas for a skill
please use this format
[code][b]skill name[/b] [b]about the skill[b][/code]
your friend eekz

item.title: A skill idea
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

         Its a little diffrent, what i was thinking was like i found some staticanimation from barrow armors that make you look fat but with out the spikes and everything...so maybe we can do something like wieght?

skill name:weight
[b]about the skill[b]: the more you eat the more you gain wieght and the fatter you get, cheese, sandwhiches, chikens, etc…

and when you train in dummys room you lose wieght…
